This independent film was made with the love and determination of it's writer and director, Paul Bunnell. It took ten years to produce and bring to the screen.

Please SUPPORT the artist by purchasing the DVD direct from JohnnyxMovie.com or other retailers.

This independent film was made with the love and determination of it's writer and director, Paul Bunnell. It took ten years and $2 million to produce and was filmed on the last rolls of B&W 35mm film made by Kodak.

Please SUPPORT the artist by purchasing the DVD or renting it online from Amazon Instant, iTunes, or your favorite store.
